Class EditPlaylistView

java.lang.Object
musicApp.views.View
musicApp.views.playlists.EditPlaylistView
public class EditPlaylistView extends View
The Playlist edit view. This is a popup window that allows the user to create or edit a playlist.

    static interface 
    EditPlaylistView.EditPlaylistViewListener
    Listener interface for handling events in the EditPlaylistView.

    • initControls

      private void initControls()
      Sets up the controls for the PlaylistEditView. This method creates the text field, buttons, and labels used in the view.

    • handleChooseImage

      private void handleChooseImage()
      Handles the action when the user selects an image for the playlist. This method opens a file chooser dialog to select an image file.
